title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 5, ch. III, pt. 23 - Specialized Industrial Effectiveness Financial Assistance
content:

State Regulations
§ 23.1 - Purpose
§ 23.2 - Local buy-out financing assistance
§ 23.3 - Criteria for local buy-out financial assistance
§ 23.4 - Terms of local buy-out loans
§ 23.5 - Procedure for local buy-out assistance
§ 23.6 - Working capital loans to improve productivity and competitiveness
§ 23.7 - Criteria for working capital loans to improve productivity and competitiveness
§ 23.8 - Terms for working capital loans to improve productivity and competitiveness
§ 23.9 - Procedures for working capital loans to improve productivity and competitiveness
§ 23.10 - Working capital loans for corporate restructuring or corporate turnaround plans
§ 23.11 - Criteria for working capital loans for corporate restructuring or corporate turnaround plans
§ 23.12 - Terms for working capital loans for corporate restructuring or corporate turnaround plans
§ 23.13 - Procedures for working capital loans for corporate restructuring or corporate turnaround plans

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 5, ch. III, pt. 23

Statutory authority: Economic Development Law, §§ 100[19], [20], [33], 190-196;N.Y.S. Urban Development Corporation Act, §§ 3[6][e], 10[e]; Omnibus Economic Development Act of 1987, § 7[a], [b][1]-[2], [e]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
